means: 迪尔伯恩马车（一种小型四轮马车），迪尔伯恩（美国一城市）

sentence.Network_en: My second and more compelling reason for going to Dearborn was to see the Henry Ford Museum.
sentence.Network_cn: 我去迪尔伯恩的第二个原因，也是更令人信服的原因，是为了参观亨利·福特博物馆。

sentence.Network_en: Mulally summoned the leaders of Ford's Asian and European operations to Dearborn.
sentence.Network_cn: 穆拉利传唤的领导人福特的亚洲和欧洲的行动,以迪尔伯恩.

sentence.Network_en: Without much thinking, she reached Dearborn Street.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有怎么考虑, 她就信步到了第邦街.

auth_sentence.content: But not everyone in Murfreesboro shares his worry of it becoming Dearborn South.
